observation: DATASOFT Home - DataSoft Corporation | Sage 50 | DSStudio  DSStudio Data Services DataSoft Store Support Services Blog Contact Us Select Page More Information Sage 50 Data Services File and Data Recovery, Purging or transforming your data we are here to help. WE ARE CREATIVE ENGINEERS AND TECHNOLOGY ARTISTS 1 2 3 Sage 50 and Peachtree Accounting Services DataSoft offers many services for Sage 50 and Peachtree Accounting Software. Our Services Include: Sage 50 Data Recovery and File Recovery Services Sage 50 Purge Service Sage 50 Fiscal Periods Change Sage 50 Data Transformation Services Sage 50 Quotation Removal Service Sage 50 Version Downgrade Service Sage 50 Shell Company Service Sage 50 Reports and Exports Need to rebuild your Sage 50 Company? Let us create everything for you except the transactions and beginning balances.  No more trying to import assemblies, payroll information, and sales tax information.  Save days of struggles. Sage 50 Quote Stripper Is importing records into your Sage 50 or Peachtree Accounting not working?  It is possible you have quotation marks in your data. Not happy with your current Sage 50 Version?  Want to change to a different version.  Yup, we can do it.  Change from Quantum to Premium or even Pro if you like. Change your Sage 50 Fiscal Periods Need to change your Sage 50 fiscal periods to different date ranges?  Don’t want to lose any transactions.  We give it back to you 100% the same with only periods changed. Peachtree | Sage 50 Data Repair Peachtree and Sage 50 Data Recovery Service.  We can fix your damaged Sage 50 or Peachtree Accounting database.  Getting I/O errors, error 57, data just not matching up? Previous Next Sign-Up for New Product Launches and Product Updates By entering your email, you are opting in to receive future information on DataSoft Corp news and promotions.  You can opt-out at any time.  I accept that DataSoft Corp may store my data and send me emails as described in the Privacy Policy EmailList First Name Last Name Email Submit Email Featured DSStudio Report Sage 50 Attachment Report View all your Sage 50 attachments in one spot.  You can search within the report to find just what you are looking for.   Need to find that invoice reference, just type it in.  Once you have what you want double click on the reference to explore all the attachments within that transaction.  DSStudio provides its basic editors for Excel Spreadsheets, Word Documents, and PDFs.  Other attachments may be saved and opened with their default viewer or editor. Products and Services Sage 50 Data and File Repair Sage 50 and Peachtree Reports Accounts Create an account Make a payment Contact and Help Copyright © 2024 DataSoft Corporation   All rights reserved. Data Recovery Sage 50 US and Peachtree Accounting Data File Repair Service. Change the fiscal period time for a Sage 50 or Peachtree Accounting Company. Data Transition Many data-related services, which include: Sage 50 Product Downgrade, Quote Removal Service, Failed Fiscal Year Close Fix, and bulk change inventory item costing. Purge Service Data Purging Service for Sage 50 and Peachtree Accounting.  Reducing file size and increasing program execution speed. Rebuild your Sage 50 / Peachtree Company in half the time. Unable to import transactions into a new company.  The quote " maybe getting in your way. × Get In Touch In a world full of options, we wanted to take a moment and say thanks for choosing us. Our Knowledgebase All Sage 50 and Peachtree Accounting support is provided for a fee. Contact Form Company Name Subject Your Message Submit Form Contact Info  Fort Lauderdale, Florida, USA  954 - 523 - 8570  s u p p o r t @ d s c o r p . c o m

thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain is indeed registered and has been since 1997, which is a good sign as scam websites often have more recent registration dates. The domain is registered through GoDaddy with a private registration, which is not uncommon for companies looking to protect their privacy. The domain also has several domain status indicators that suggest it is being actively maintained and not set for deletion or transfer, which can be reassuring. To further confirm the legitimacy of the site, I should check for customer feedback or mentions on social media platforms to see if there are any reports of scams associated with this URL.

There appears to be no specific mentions or feedback related to dscorp.com on Twitter, which could mean that there's no significant negative attention surrounding the site on this platform. However, the absence of mentions does not necessarily indicate legitimacy, as it could also mean the site is not widely known or discussed. I should also check Reddit to see if there's any mention or discussion about dscorp.com that would provide additional insight into its reputation.

There are no Reddit posts or comments related to dscorp.com. This lack of information makes it difficult to determine the reputation of the website based on user feedback. Since I have yet to find any direct evidence of a scam, and the WHOIS data suggests a long-standing domain registration, I should now check for secure communication protocols and any unusual payment methods mentioned on the site.

thought: The certificate information shows that the website is using a certificate from Let's Encrypt, which is a reputable certificate authority. The certificates are recent and are valid for the typical three-month period that Let's Encrypt provides. This indicates that the site is using a secure communication protocol (HTTPS). With secure communication in place and no evidence of scam characteristics, it seems that the website is likely legitimate. However, I should perform a final check on the payment methods if available on the site to ensure they are not unusual or suspicious.

The extracted hyperlinks don't provide any information about payment methods. It seems that the payment method details might not be directly available from the hyperlink extraction. However, I have not observed any typical scam characteristics such as unrealistic claims, targeting of psychological weaknesses, unclear privacy policies, or unusual payment methods. Based on the accessible status of the website, the longstanding domain registration, the absence of scam characteristics in the website's content, the use of secure communication protocols, and the lack of negative mentions on social media, I now know the final answer. Based on the observations and lack of scam indicators, the URL https://dscorp.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.
